title: Chestnut, lentil and vegetable stew
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '3 celery stalks, chopped', '4 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1L vegetable stock', '500ml water', '1 (400g) tin whole plum tomatoes, undrained', '1 (400g) tin brown or Puy lentils', '300g cooked and peeled chestnuts', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
